Summary: Saw a perfectly round orange light.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Petersburg
There were no other sightings in Petersburg on or around September 30th 1968
divs: sighting detailsas far as my ufo expierence it took place when i was 10 years in 1968.it was in october and around 8:00 or so in the evening. i was bored and was on my parents sofa on my knees looking out our window that faced north... my arms were folded on the back of the sofa with my chin resting on my arms... i use to like to look out of this window at night as there was an old train depot north of town that i could see from this window.. i had been looking out of the window probably for 2 or 3 minutes looking at the train depot when my eyes glanced upward... still looking north and i thought..."wow the moon is perfectly round and orange tonight and it was the biggest that i had ever seen the moon...i stared at what i thought was the moon for a good minute then happened to look off to the northwest and saw the actual moon which was bright in the sky as it was a clear night... i then looked back at the orange object and noticed how perfectly round it was and it was a deep dark orange in color... i watched it another good minute or two... the size of the object was probably about 1 1\2 times bigger than a normal full moon. then all of a sudden this orange object shot off and stopped ...it then appeared to be about half of the size as when i first saw it ...it stayed in this location for about 2 seconds...shot off again...looked to be about an 1\8 of the original size...then shot off again and disappeared... the speed this thing was traveling at reminded me of when on the old tv series startrek the enterprise would take off and quickly disappear into space... the strangest thing about this was that i remember that i must have been staring right at the object when i first looked out of the window but didn't realize it until all of a sudden i was looking right at it...i guess i must have been daydreaming to not see it right way because all of a sudden it was right there...
